name: RetrieveCustomerMessages
description:
Retrieve deliveries sent to a customer within a time range.

Use parameters to specify the time range for the messages you want to retrieve. If no time range is provided, it defaults to the most recent 6 months. The tool returns data on when deliveries were created, which may differ from when they were sent.

parameters.name: customer_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the customer whose message deliveries you want to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer you want to perform an operation against.

parameters.name: customer_id_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of customer_id used to reference a person. Options: 'id', 'email', 'cio_id'. Defaults to 'id' if not provided.

value_schema.description: The type of `customer_id` you want to use to reference a person. If you don't provide this parameter, we assume that the `customer_id` in your request is a person's `id`.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token for the page of results to return. Use the `next` property from previous responses to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve per page. This limits the number of messages returned in a single response.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: starting_timestamp
parameters.description: The beginning timestamp for the query in integer format, used to filter messages by start date.

value_schema.description: The beginning timestamp for your query.

parameters.name: query_end_timestamp
parameters.description: The ending timestamp (in integer format) for the query to limit data retrieval to specific time ranges.

value_schema.description: The ending timestamp for your query.
